website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting a log cabin feel for their dog house at a cheaper cost should check out this reasonably-priced model.
pros: Built resistant to both water and weather
Raised flooring offers dry floor and clean interior for your pet
Roof can be opened for easy cleaning
cons: A few customers had issues with the product arriving damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Good for perhaps 'dog furniture' indoors or under a roofed ...
customer_reviews.text: Product made with thin cheap material (a ruler thickness). construction but made very poorly. I was going to order 10 of them for my kennel... now I won't. Good for perhaps 'dog furniture' indoors or under a roofed area for summer use but won't survive a winter with the light coming through the slats...nice for summer type weather but not cold.... legs poorly made, a brick is better than those. The only thing I'm happy with is seeing a design and knowing what I DON'T want my houses made of.
customer_reviews.author: Inthedoghouse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy for me to put together, it took about 45 minutes to an hour with the help,of my son, definitely need two people.I could. It figure out how to get the hinges on the roof so it would close properly so I finally gave up and left them off. My puppy loves her house, she’s 7 lbs so she has plenty of room to stand and walk around, we keep her bed in the corner so she can have her food in there if she wants. It’s sturdy, and looks good in our backyard under the patio, keeps her safe and warm while outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Burgess

customer_reviews.title: No dog but great for a coop ;)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a mini chicken coop for 3 bantam chickens. Perfect size for their nests and the 3 roosting bars I added for them. The top opens for easy egg gathering. It's so awesome that I sometimes catch a couple of our lazy full sized chickens sneaking in there to lay so they don't have to climb the ramp into their own coop
customer_reviews.author: Rynkydynk

customer_reviews.title: Dog House for a Cat
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is for an incontinent cat --- I guess that makes it a Cat House. Arrived in 4 days. Instructions were adequate and assembly was intuitive. An extra screw of each size was supplied in the event needed. Sloping shingled roof will protect from stormy weather. Raised floor is nice to keep dry if resting on the ground. The acid test -- when I introduce it to Princess-SweetiePie as soon as the weather gets a bit warmer --- she's been exiled to garage with a pad, heater, food, water & litterbox till the warmer weather permits using the cat-house awaiting on our raised deck. .
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little house!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mini dachshund and my cat. They fit in there together. We have it under a covered patio to keep it out of sun/rain/snow. Because we experience extremely low winter temperatures, we also applied insulation panels to the inside and under the floor as well as a heated outdoor pad, warm bedding and a vinyl door and a sturdy canvas cover. They love it, especially the kitty. It’s her happy place. I don’t know how durable it would be in the elements though. I would probably find something made of heartier material for an outdoor kennel.
customer_reviews.author: A & J Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: The wood and hardware are VERY poor quality! Hardware bends easily and the wood split in multiple places within 2 days of putting it together. It is garbage. This was purchased for a chihuahua. It is a good size for her, and my miniature Australian Shepherd can also fit into it for a total dog weight of 38 pounds. It just won't hold up now that it's split so badly. I expect it will be collapsing within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: strrynght514

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I guess they didn't do a quality control check because the legs were completely solid wood and it was extremely hard to power drill into to ultimately attach the legs. I'm handicap and was unable to do this on my own and my boyfriend tried to help me but it was really hard and upsetting. Anyway beside that the black painter roof rim chips off and I've gotten splinters reaching for my pet. :( I'm giving this 3 starts instead of just one because it is still a pretty nice looking, sturdy little house.
customer_reviews.author: MoniqueWetdog

customer_reviews.title: Good size, loose floor
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy. The only thing I didn't like about it was how easy the floor pops up and comes out. I got this for rabbits and they go under and push the floor out all the time. It did have a strong oder aswell but that faded with time
customer_reviews.author: ThePanda

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fine dog house. I like that the floor is removable and the lid opens for easy cleaning. I’ve had it for about 3-4 months and it gets the job done, though to be fair, my pups don’t use it a lot as they are house dogs. It was easy to put together myself with three kids bugging me and didn’t take much time. My only real complaint is that the wood had been filled with wood filler on the front panel and it looks a little tacky. But whatever, it’s a dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Poetker

customer_reviews.title: Bought for dogs, but cats use it even more~!
customer_reviews.text: I have this out on my front porch that is screened in and my dogs love sitting out there, so I thought I'd give them a little home to snuggle in if they wanted to stay out (they have a dog door that they can use anytime to go in or out) . Come to find out, my two cats use it even more. I really like it and it's also nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Renee SD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid little dog house, perfect for my pup i suggest the flap door also.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Vague Instructions
customer_reviews.text: AS a 65 year old woman with a 9 year old son, we did pretty good at putting the house together. The instruction drawings weren't to clear. I still haven't figured out where to put the hinges on the inside. But that is okay. I don't really need them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great pet house
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Actually bought it as a duck house! My ducks love it and with the lifting roof it’s easy to gather my eggs every morning ! Great product ! I put it together in about 15 minutes !
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Good dog house for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice looking dog house and easy to put together have not it had it long enough to read it durability The hinges that hold the roof open work will holding the roof open but do not collapse correctly other than that it is a nice doghouse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog's love it.
customer_reviews.text: The house was easy to assemble -- except we used more and different headed screws. As well, the dog (two small chihauhaus) house is under the roof of a porch and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Terry H. Mehaffey

customer_reviews.title: I hIghly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!! My little boy (pup) and I are both extremely satisfied! I will definitely go back to the brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with a Phillips screwdriver. It was simple and took me less than 30 minutes (I’m a 38 year old woman). The ‘small’ fits both my Boston terrier and French bulldog inside but they like to snuggle very closely. Not sure about durability. I’ve only had it 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our outside cat and it was so simple to put together. It has a few gaps in places and will need to be insulated for Illinois winters but that was expected. I am disappointed in the bottom floor panels. It would need to be reinforced for any pet weighing more than a cat or small dog. Looks better than the plastic houses on the market so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: bought for 2 Roosters
customer_reviews.text: makes good Duck,chicken or Rabbit house as well as dog.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: returned due to smell
customer_reviews.text: Returned it, no way was I making my animals sleep in it - smell was so bad, probable chemicals used to treat wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood Splits Pretty Easily
customer_reviews.text: I am using this dog house for my outdoor cat. It’s super cool looking but the wood is pretty cheap. There is some space between some of the boards so I don’t expect it to be very warm during the winter. A lot of the wood split during assembly and the hinge mechanism is wanky. The wood on the back of the house ended up splitting when I tried to close the roof so now I am not able to lift the roof using the hinges. Overall it is cute and will work for what I need, but I wish it turned out exactly like the video...
customer_reviews.author: Cwhitte5

customer_reviews.title: Arrived splintered small piece broken so I just glued it ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived splintered small piece broken so I just glued it Putting it together was simple but everything started breaking Cheap thin material So frustrated I just threw it in thrash Guess Ill take the loss
customer_reviews.author: R W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy for small to medium sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and my 2 dacshunds love it. Great protection from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Ninesixx

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our four outdoor cats and it was better than I expected. I’m pleased to report the house came in just as I expected. Very simple to put together and seems to be well built for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Doghouse
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy easy to assemble The roof is water proof shingles but the walls are not waterproof so I will probably paint it with deck seal
customer_reviews.author: RebEl73

customer_reviews.title: Feral Cat House
customer_reviews.text: The house is outdoors under a covered roof however, I doubt if I would leave outside without the cover exposed to the elements. I also did not set the house on the ground because I was not sure of it sturdiness or could withstand the wet ground. I set ontop of pallet and it seems to be doing ok. Time will tell how long this house lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Do not tighten real tight wood will split.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in great shape when it arrived. Went together in 20 minutes by myself.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It took about 30 minutes. Well-made and perfect size for our miniature schnauzer. Roof lifts up for easy access for placing bedding or cleaning out.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy house for feral cats!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect house for our feral cats to snuggle together. It took a while to assemble but it was not difficult for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Stosik

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It looks awesome and our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog house and great option for all-weather shelter too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayak Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great animal hotel
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble. Sturdy but not heavy. I am using it to house my two ducks. The top opens for easy cleanout. Very happy with my purchase....
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, easy to build
customer_reviews.text: the wood panel broke where the hinges were screwed in on the second time lifting the roof. Our dog had puppies so it was important for us to have accessibility to them. very strong wood treatment chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: dayanna ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doghouse for my Westie!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Two of us assembled in about 40 minutes. The only part of assembly that needs two people is putting on the hinges on the roof. I’m so happy with the quality and size. I’m amazed at the quality for the price point! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC in Goshen, OH

customer_reviews.title: Its good.
customer_reviews.text: It seems a little flimsy, but it works. I wish it was just a tad easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lane

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received and I had high hopes. As soon as I opened the package most peices were broken. And if a piece was not broken, the wood was so cheap it was covered in splinters. Definitely not safe for dogs. Avoid this like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: joel ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Actually like the product itself but it came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Actually like the product itself but it came damaged. Did not have time to exchange or return but lucky for me my son is handy and was able to fix it. Not sure it was worth $70 coming damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dogs! 🐱
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed! Love the rustic look. Something my cat can use to get out of the weather. My son put it together and said it was very easy. Love that the roof is on hinges for easy access to clean bedding. It is under a porch and not in full weather. Would definately purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. The dogs like to get on it as much as in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, but wood isn't very thick. Should work great for our outdoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. The wood seems to be very light for an outdoor house. I sat mine on a patio and stuffed with straw. My adult cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Fishman5

customer_reviews.title: The directions were straight forward and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The directions were straight forward and easy to follow. The finished product is very functional and aesthetically pleasing. It appears to be well constructed and durable. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible , not only it came with chipped pieces out of the wood then I’m like ok get what you paid for not that expensive then I realize How this Wood cheap as hell. Breaking as i put it together. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't open lid!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the money .but put no effort into the hinge system for the roof hinges are flimsy on the side instructions are horrible and no way to secure the back of the roof besides six screws. Crappy!!
customer_reviews.author: ben m.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, not complicated and we love that the roof is hinged for easy access
customer_reviews.author: Rodney D Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material but okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what is in the pictures but it’s kind of cheap material and one of the slats on the side we’re broken off (luckily my hubby could fix it) but it seems to work okay.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great little house!! Perfect size to fit a standard dog bed and blanket inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pressley

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, great dog house at a excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I did it on my own with a power drill in about 30 mins. Perfect for my outdoor cat this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Grice

customer_reviews.title: My puppies love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and has been awesome.... live the fact I can open the top and clean it out if I need to ... super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. It looks really nice and with the lid opening it’s very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Cat house
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my outside cats. It looks like a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bohn

customer_reviews.title: I’m waiting for a big discount and money back
customer_reviews.text: Late and broken I had to fixed it not happy
customer_reviews.author: mario escalante

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble & holds up great in the rain, no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for shelter for my turtles, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Lain

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little dog house - great price!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with instructions that were not always easy to read - putting the hinges on towards the end was strange - but my dog loves it and while I imagined having to make her go in it she actually goes in it all the time to sleep. It smells like cedar but I imagine that I will need to varnish it to keep it from going bad out in the elements. I just needed one Philips screwdriver to build the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Put a pet bed and blanket in it cats love it and gets them out of the weather if ...
customer_reviews.text: Put a pet bed and blanket in it cats love it and gets them out of the weather if we are not home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for our pup
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for our pup!! Arrived in perfect condition. The instruction sheet could be better but we figured it out, it wasn't difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Lilli

customer_reviews.title: product was not well labeled and had very basic instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: product was not well labeled and had very basic instructions. My daughter and I were able to figure it out but we messed the roof hinge up by not putting the hinges on first and then the side rails. there were no marking on where to place the hinges on the roof and the sides of the roof. overall product is okay. I would say size wise if you are looking to put 2 small dogs in this then go for the next size up. We have a wiener dog mix and a small poodle and they are cramped.
customer_reviews.author: Karentall

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was used to offer shelter to outdoor cats. It was not fun to assemble it was actually a bit difficult. We bought this because it had the insulation which was a joke and did not fit in the house that was a nightmare to try to get that to work and it still never fit right so the roof never laid flat. Overall it provides shelter and was easy to put food in. Held up in the cold weather under a deck I’m not sure how it would hold up if it were to get wet. This definitely saved some lives.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits like it!
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a rabbit shelter in a large outdoor run, and it works really well for this purpose. Interestingly, the rabbits like to hang out on the top, and one will play a game of jumping off, running around, return to the top, and repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Skalabs

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The wood came splintered - had to return it. It was a good size for our 2 small dogs and looked cute but not durable. It was thin, cheap wood.
customer_reviews.author: Keni

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves her new cabin
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves her new cabin, very functional, top opens up
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gaehler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Roof came damaged. Piece had broken off from the edge. Did not return because it is still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Idalia

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed!! Actually use it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed!! Actually use it for a number of purposes- use it to keep my generator in during any power failures, store my sand and salt during the winter season!
customer_reviews.author: robert

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Wooden Log Cabin Dog House w/Opening Roof for Small Dogs, Outdoor Kennel, Pet Shelter
feature_bullets: PROTECTIVE DESIGN: Log cabin design with a slanted roof and off-centered entryway keeps your pet protected from harsh weather conditions
RAISED FLOOR: For additional pet protection from harsh weather, the raised design keeps drafts away and the floor dry
OPEN-UP ROOF: Provides easy access for cleaning and airing out the interior to maintain a hygienic dog house
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: A lasting gift for your little pooch, made weather- and water-resistant with solid fir wood and an asphalt shingle roof

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
